meanings.definition: Contemptibly small or few in quantity; paltry or petty.
meanings.sent1: The measliest amount of candy was left in the jar.
meanings.sent2: She received the measliest gift at the party.
meanings.sent3: Even the measliest ant can carry many times its weight.
meanings.sent4: His measliest effort still outshines others' best attempts.
meanings.sent5: The measliest star in the sky still shines brightly.

meanings.definition: Of the poorest quality or smallest size; inferior or insignificant.
meanings.sent2: He lived in the measliest apartment in the building.
meanings.sent3: The measliest pencil in the box always breaks first.
meanings.sent4: Her measliest painting captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: Even the measliest flower adds beauty to the garden.
